Templates.name: Modernity Addon 1.7.10
Templates.description: Download this first and place your downloaded Addons inside of it.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the regular Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Stained Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Stained Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Tinted Glass
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Tinted Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Sugarcane
Connected Textures.description: Connects the Sugarcane blocks so that they appear as frazzled at the top, regardless of their height.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Bookshelves
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Bookshelves so that they appear as one long shelf.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Randomized Bookshelves__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

(Keep in mind, that Brick Walls require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Bricks Complete Pack__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Planks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Planks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs, Fences and Fence Gates. Also includes small tweaks for Fences, Buttons and Pressure Plates. Also randomizes the textures of Crimson, Warped, Cherry and Mangrove Planks.

(Keep in mind, that Fences, Fence Gates, Buttons and Pressure Plates for the different wood types require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Desaturated Dark Oak Complete Pack__!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Curracabah Acacia Complete Pack__!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Vintage Cherry Complete Pack__!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Darker Mangrove Complete Pack__!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Red Crimson Complete Pack__!}
#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Muted Warped Wood Complete Pack__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Grass and Fern [old]
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Tall Grass and Ferns so that they appear to be of random height. Also applies a mirrored texture to Dead Bushes.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Randomized Grass and Fern__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Bookshelves
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the side texture for Bookshelves so that they appear to be more random.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Connected Bookshelves__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Pumpkins
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the side texture for Pumpkins and Jack o'Lanterns.

#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Pumpkin Complete Pack__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Fixed Pumpkin__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Mushrooms
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the textures for Red and Brown Mushrooms.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Flowers
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Dandelion, Poppy, Allium, Azure Bluet, Blue Orchid, Oxeye Daisy, Tulips, Cornflower, Lily of the Valley and Wither Rose.

(Keep in mind, that the Cornflower, Lily of the Valley and Wither Rose all require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Lilypads
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the textures for Lilypads to make them more random.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Cobblestone
Randomized Blocks.description: Randomizes the texture of Cobblestone to appear more random. Also applies to Cobblestone Slabs, Stairs and Walls.

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Stone Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Stone Bricks, Mossy Stone Bricks, Cracked Stone Bricks and Chiseled Stone Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls. Also makes Mossy Stone Brick take on a more saturated look when in certain biomes associated with wetness.

(Keep in mind, that Stone Brick Walls, Mossy Stone Brick Slabs, Mossy Stone Brick Stairs and Mossy Stone Brick Walls require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#FDCB58{This pack **overrides** __Saturated Mossy Stone__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Deepslate and Blackstone Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Deepslate Bricks, Cracked Deepslate Bricks, Blackstone Bricks and Cracked Blackstone Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

(Keep in mind, that Deepslate and Blackstone require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Mud Bricks
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the texture for Mud Bricks in whole Blocks and Stairs, Slabs and Walls.

(Keep in mind, that Mud Bricks require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Leaves
Randomized Blocks.description:
Gives Oak, Spruce, Birch, Jungle, Acacia and Dark Oak Leaves colorful blots and randomizes them aswell to avoid tiling.

(Inspiration drawn from [Os' Colorful Leaves](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/os-colorful-leaves/).)

**⚠️ Warning: Due to technical limitations, it is not possible to correctly differentiate between *Fancy* and *Fast* Leaves. As a workaround, I will provide two fully functional texture packs instead of normal Addons. These packs are Labeled [Fancy] and [Fast] respectively. Just switch the packs as you see fit (or just use the one you want). This will be addressed when Right Proper MCPatcher supports dynamic texture picking for Leaves.**

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Vines
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the Vine textures utilizing the unused iterations from the Texture Update.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Rotated Vines__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Vines Complete Pack__!}

Randomized Blocks.name: Randomized Grass and Fern
Randomized Blocks.description:
Randomizes the textures for Tall Grass and Ferns so that they appear more diverse. Also applies a new textures to Dead Bushes. Makes use of the new Bush textures from 1.21.5.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Randomized Grass and Fern [old]__!}

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Cows
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Cows. Cold biomes will have Wooly Cows in them. Now also includes the Cow textures from Minecraft Earth aswell as the Cold and Warm Cow textures from 1.21.5!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Chickens
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Chickens. Mushroom Islands will have Cluckshrooms on them. The End will have Midnight Chickens in them. Now also includes the Chicken textures from Minecraft Earth aswell as the Cold and Warm Chicken textures from 1.21.5!

Randomized Entities.name: Occasional Glowsquids
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Squids to include Glowsquids.

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Pigs
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Pigs. Swamplands will have muddy Pigs in them. Now also includes the Pig textures from Minecraft Earth aswell as the Cold and Warm Pig textures from 1.21.5!

Randomized Entities.name: Minecraft Earth Zombies
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Extreme Hills will have Bouldering Zombies in them. Everywhere else gets a mix of normal Zombies and Lobber Zombies.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Player Skin Zombies [1]__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Player Skin Zombies [2]__!}

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Sheep
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Sheep. Cold biomes will have fuzzy Sheep in them, Taiga biomes will have inky Sheep in them and Extreme Hills will have rocky Sheep in them. Now also includes the Cow textures from Minecraft Earth!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Slimes
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Slimes. Beaches and Oceans will have tropically blue slimes. Now also includes the Slime textures from Minecraft Earth and Minecraft Dungeons!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Wolves
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Wolves. Now also includes the new Wolf textures from 1.20.80!

Randomized Entities.name: Classic-style Spider
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Spiders. Includes a brown Spider that looks similar to the Classic version. Also includes a version for the Cave Spider.

Randomized Entities.name: Alpha-style Zombie Pigman
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Zombie Pigmen. Includes a bloody Zombie Pigman that looks similar to the Alpha version.

Randomized Entities.name: Player Skin Zombies [1]
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Includes zombified versions of the new player skins that were added in 1.19.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Minecraft Earth Zombies__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Player Skin Zombies [2]__!}

Randomized Entities.name: Player Skin Zombies [2]
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Zombies. Includes even more raggedy zombified versions of the new player skins that were added in 1.19.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Minecraft Earth Zombies__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Player Skin Zombies [1]__!}

Randomized Entities.name: Tribal Ghast
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Ghasts. Sometimes they have dark red lines on them.

(Inspiration drawn from [Twilight Forest](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/the-twilight-forest).)

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Skeletons
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Skeletons. Adds a beheaded and a mossy variant. Now also includes the Skeleton textures from the Stray without clothing and the Bogged from 1.20.5 with its overlay texture merged into the normal layer!

Randomized Entities.name: Randomized Rabbits
Randomized Entities.description:
Randomizes the texture for Rabbits. Desert Rabbits will not be changed, same as Toast and Killer Bunny. Now also includes the Rabbit textures from Minecraft Earth!

(Keep in mind, that Rabbits require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Randomized Entities.name: Occasional Albino Endermen
Randomized Entities.description: Randomizes the texture for Endermen. Occasionally you'll encounter a rare white Enderman with green eyes!

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Bedrock
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Bedrock texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Dirt
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Dirt texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Grass
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Grass texture to appear more random. Also rotates the underside Dirt texture.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Cactus
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Cactus' top, side and bottom textures to appear more random.

#FDCB58{This pack **overrides** __Blooming Cactus__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Cactus Complete Pack__!}

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Stone
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Stone texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Sand
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Sand texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Red Sand
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Red Sand texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Clay
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Clay texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Cobweb
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Cobweb texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Mycelium
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Mycelium texture to appear more random. Also rotates the underside Dirt texture.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Podzol
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Podzol texture to appear more random. Also rotates the underside Dirt texture.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Podzol Complete Pack__!}

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Brown Podzol
Rotated Blocks.description:
Changes the Podzol texture to remove the greenish specs in it and rotates it to appear more random. Also rotates the underside Dirt texture.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Podzol Complete Pack__!}

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Gravel
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Gravel texture to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Tweaked Gravel
Rotated Blocks.description: Changes the Gravel texture into a more grainy variant and rotates it to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Cake
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Cake textures to appear more random.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Cake Complete Pack__!}

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Wool
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Wool textures to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Vines
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Vine textures to appear more random.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Randomized Vines__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Vines Complete Pack__!}

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Logs
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Logs top textures to appear more random. Also rotates the textures of Crimson and Warped Stems and Cherry and Mangrove Logs and Bamboo Blocks.

(Keep in mind, that Crimson and Warped Stems and Cherry and Mangrove Logs require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Andesite
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Andesite textures in whole blocks, Slabs, Stairs and Walls to appear more random. Also fixes the side texture of Polished Andesite Slabs and Stairs.

(Keep in mind, that Andesite requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Granite
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Granite textures in whole blocks, Slabs, Stairs and Walls to appear more random. Also fixes the side texture of Polished Granite Slabs and Stairs.

(Keep in mind, that Granite requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Diorite
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Diorite textures in whole blocks, Slabs, Stairs and Walls to appear more random. Also fixes the side texture of Polished Diorite Slabs and Stairs.

(Keep in mind, that Diorite requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Black Granite
Rotated Blocks.description:
Replaces the Granite textures with a deep black one and rotates them in whole blocks, Slabs, Stairs and Walls to appear more random. Also fixes the side texture of Polished Granite Slabs and Stairs.

(Keep in mind, that Granite requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)
(Inspiration drawn from [Redrooey](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/black-granite/).)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Mushrooms
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the Mushroom blocks textures to appear more random.

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Sand Concrete Powders
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Sand Concrete Powder textures to appear more random.

(Keep in mind, that Concrete Powder requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Basalt
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the Basalt side and top textures to appear more random.

(Keep in mind, that Basalt requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Nylium
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the top textures of Crimson and Warped Nylium to appear more random.

(Keep in mind, that Nylium requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Moss
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the textures of Moss Blocks and Carpets to appear more random.

(Keep in mind, that Moss Blocks and Carpets require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Azalea
Rotated Blocks.description:
Rotates the top and side textures of Azalea and Flowering Azalea to appear more random.

(Keep in mind, that Azalea and Flowering Azalea require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Rotated Blocks.name: Rotated Snow
Rotated Blocks.description: Rotates the top and side textures of Snow Layers and Snow Blocks to appear more random.

Fixes.name: Fixed Pistons
Fixes.description:
Fixes the underside of the Piston Head to look more fitting. Also gives the side of the Sticky Piston a bit of slime to distinguish both types of Piston.

(Inspiration drawn from [Vanilla Tweaks](https://vanillatweaks.net/).)

Fixes.name: Fixed Furnace
Fixes.description: Fixes the underside of Furnaces and Lit Furnaces. Now displays a modified version of the Smooth Stone topside.

Fixes.name: Fixed Crafting Table
Fixes.description: Fixes the underside of the Crafting Table. Now displays a simply modified Oak Planks texture.

Fixes.name: Fixed Pumpkins
Fixes.description:
Fixes the underside of the Pumpkin. Also applies to Jack o'Lanterns.

#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Pumpkin Complete Pack__!}
#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Randomized Pumpkin__!}

Fixes.name: Golden Totem of Undying
Fixes.description:
Changes the Totem of Undying's texture into actual Gold.

(Keep in mind, that the Totem of Undying requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Fixes.name: Fixed Weighted Pressure Plates
Fixes.description: Changes the top texture of the Weighted Pressure Plates so that they have a rim around them.

Fixes.name: Sand Concrete Powders
Fixes.description: Changes the textures for Concrete Powders to use the Sand lineart.

Fixes.name: Colored Stems
Fixes.description: Applies coloration to the Pumpkin and Melon Stems in their normal and attached form.

Fixes.name: Deepslate Ore Top Textures
Fixes.description:
Provides a dedicated top texture to all Deepslate Ores.

(Keep in mind, that Deepslate Ores require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with __Unlit Redstone Ore__!}

Fixes.name: Fixed Shulkers
Fixes.description:
Changes the textures for Shulkers and Shulker Boxes that haven't been touched by Jappa.

(Keep in mind, that Shulkers and Shulker Boxes require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Fixes.name: Gilded Blackstone Top Textures
Fixes.description:
Provides a dedicated top texture to Gilded Blackstone.

(Keep in mind, that Gilded Blackstone requires [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Fixes.name: Better Opaque Leaves
Fixes.description:
Fixes the black pixels on the 'Fast' setting Leaves textures to be more in line with the Leaves of the trees added in later versions.

(Inspiration drawn from [Vanilla Tweaks](https://vanillatweaks.net/).)

#FDCB58{This pack **gets overridden** by __Darker Dark Oak Leaves__!}

Fixes.name: Fixed Campfires
Fixes.description:
Changes Campfires to be free of ash when they're not lit. Also applies a Soul Soil texture to Soul Campfires.

(Keep in mind, that Campfires require [CampfireBackport](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/campfire-backport) to be present.)

(Inspiration drawn from [Vanilla Tweaks](https://vanillatweaks.net/).)

⚠️ Careful: This Addon can't simply be placed into the `assets/minecraft` folder. You have to place it into the `assets` folder, because the `campfirebackport` folder is in the Addon itself!

Fixes.name: 1.19.4 Potion Colors
Fixes.description:
Changes the textures of all Potions, Splash Potions and Lingering Potions of Vanilla and Et Futurum Requiem to make them use their 1.19.4 colors.

(Keep in mind, that Lingering Potions require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

⚠️ Careful: This Addon is a bit overkill. Not only does it replace all the potion colors using a `color.properties` file, it also replaces every single potion in (as I hope) every possible configuration with a finished texture that overrides the vanilla 'bottle + potion overlay' system. This is not technically necessary to change the potion colors, but it gets rid of the Enchantment Glint, that was also removed from potions in 1.19.4.

Fixes.name: Lowered Nether Sprouts
Fixes.description:
Changes the item texture of the Nether Sprouts so that the player is actually holding it.

(Keep in mind, that Nether Sprouts require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Fixes.name: Fixed Blast Furnace
Fixes.description:
Fixes the underside of Blast Furnaces and Lit Blast Furnaces. Now displays a modified version of the Smooth Stone topside with a modified palette.

(Keep in mind, that Blast Furnaces require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

Fixes.name: Fixed Trapdoor Sides
Fixes.description:
Fixes the side textures of all Trapdoors.

(Keep in mind, that Acacia, Birch, Dark Oak, Jungle, Spruce, Crimson, Warped, Cherry, Mangrove, Bamboo, Iron and Copper Trapdoors require [Et Futurum Requiem](https://modrinth.com/mod/etfuturum) to be present.)

#78B159{(Attached is an additional file that makes the Copper Trapdoors consistent with __Actually Waxed Copper__.)}

Templates.name: Modernity Addon 1.12.2
Templates.description: Download this first and place your downloaded Addons inside of it.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the regular Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Stained Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Stained Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Bookshelves
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Bookshelves so that they appear as one long shelf.

#DD2E44{This pack is **incompatible** with Randomized Bookshelves!}

Main Texture Pack.name: Palettized Programmer Art
Main Texture Pack.description: Palettized Programmer Art texture pack, made by me. Its goal is to retain as much of the Programmer Art look as possible while also providing sane palettes to the textures so that texture artists can work with them more easily.

Templates.name: Palettized Programmer Art Addon 1.7.10
Templates.description: Download this first and place your downloaded Addons inside of it.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Glass
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the regular Glass blocks so that they appear as one singular pane of glass.

This works for full Glass blocks as well as Glass Panes.

Connected Textures.name: Connected Bookshelves
Connected Textures.description:
Connects the Bookshelves so that they appear as one long shelf.

#DD2E44{This pack **is incompatible** with Randomized Bookshelves!}
